Package us.radiri.merc.geo

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Circle
    An ellipse in which the length and width are the same.
    Ellipse
    An ellipse that can have a length and width.
    Line  
    Point
    A point shape.
    Rectangle
    A rectangle shape.
    Shape
    The abstraction of all shapes.
    Triangle
    A triangle shape; 3 sides.
    Vec
    A base class for all vectors.
    Vec2
    A Vector that contains 2 values: x and y.
    Vec3
